data.rule: Prohibited on bay 01/02 positions not protected by break water
Prohibited on bay 03 positions not protected by units in bay 01
Temperature controlled cargo (UNNO 3113-20 and 3233-40) stowed on bottom tier, 4 x 20' bays from living quarters, close to ship's side with door accessible
Winter Time: Prohibited on bay 01/02/03 on Atlantic & Pacific crossings
Marine Pollutant preferably stowed under deck where IMDG code permits
Prohibited in Cargo Hold fore/aft of Accommodation & Funnel
Prohibited on 40' bay (60' if 20' dedicated) fore/aft of Accommodation & Funnel
